## Data Science {.main-heading}  

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning="FALSE"}
projs <- read.table("projectsList.csv", sep="\t", header=TRUE)

projectNames <- projs$Project
projectHyperlinks <- projs$Link
projectDesc <- projs$Description
```
